sen.j: 寶塚キネマ興行株式會社（たからづか-、1932年11月 設立 - 1934年2月 解散）は、かつて京都に存在した映画会社である。
sen.e: Takarazuka Kinema Kogyo (established in November 1932, liquidated in February 1934) was a movie company once existed in Kyoto.
Takarazuka Kinema Kogyo (established in November of 1932, liquidated in February of 1934) was a film company that existed in Kyoto.
sen.cmt: changed "movie" to "film"; changed "once" to "that"; added "of" before 1932 and 1934
sen.e: Takarazuka Kinema Kogyo (established in November of 1932, liquidated in February of 1934) was a film company that existed in Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 高村正次と南喜三郎が設立、正映マキノキネマの「御室撮影所」と、東亜キネマの配給興行網と、阪急電鉄の小林一三の資本を仰いで設立された。
sen.e: The company was established by Masatsugu TAKAMURA and Kisaburo MINAMI relying on "Omuro Studio" of Shoei Makino Kinema, distribution network of Toa Kinema and funds of Hankyu Railway's Ichizo KOBAYASHI.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: It was established by Masatsugu TAKAMURA and Kisaburo MINAMI relying on the "Omuro Studio" of Shoei Makino Kinema, the distribution network of Toa Kinema and funds from Hankyu Railway's Ichizo KOBAYASHI.
sen.cmt: changed "The company" to "It"; added "the" before "Omuro Studio" and "distribution network"; changed "of Hankyu" to "from "Hankyu"
sen.e: It was established by Masatsugu TAKAMURA and Kisaburo MINAMI relying on the 'Omuro Studio' of Shoei Makino Kinema, the distribution network of Toa Kinema and funds from Hankyu Railway's Ichizo KOBAYASHI.
sen.cmt: " "を' 'に変更しました。

sen.j: しかし、設立わずか半年で経営が崩壊、賃金未払いが起きる。
sen.e: However, the company ran into financial difficulty only half a year after its establishment and couldn't afford to pay wages.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: However, the company ran into financial difficulty only half a year after its establishment and was unable to pay its wages.
sen.cmt: changed "couldn't" to "was unable to"; changed "afford to pay wages" to "pay its wages";
sen.e: However, the company ran into financial difficulty only half a year after its establishment and was unable to pay its wages.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: It was liquidated just a year over after its establishment.
It was liquidated a little over a year after its establishment.
sen.cmt: changed "just a year over" to "a little over a year"
sen.e: It was liquidated a little over a year after its establishment.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1932年（昭和7年）11月、高村正次が映画製作を断念した東亜キネマを買収、東活映画社の社長を辞任した南喜三郎とともに設立したのが、この「宝塚キネマ興行」である。
sen.e: In November 1932, Masatsugu TAKAMURA purchased Toa Kinema which had given up the production of films and established "Takarazuka Kinema Kogyo" jointly with Kisaburo MINAMI who had resigned as the president of Tokatsu Eiga-sha.

In November of 1932, Masatsugu TAKAMURA took over Toa Kinema after it had given up film production and established "Takarazuka Kinema Kogyo" in partnership with Kisaburo MINAMI who had resigned as the president of Tokatsu Eiga-sha.
sen.cmt: added "of" after "November"; changed "purchased" to "took over"; changed "which" to "after it"; changed "production of films" to "film production"; changed "jointly" to "in partnership";
sen.e: In November of 1932, Masatsugu TAKAMURA took over Toa Kinema after it had given up film production and established 'Takarazuka Kinema Kogyo' in partnership with Kisaburo MINAMI who had resigned as the president of Tokatsu Eiga-sha.
sen.cmt: " "を' 'に変更しました。

sen.j: 「御室撮影所」を「宝塚キネマ撮影所」と改称して稼動させた。
sen.e: The company changed "Omuro Studio" to "Takarazuka Kinema Studio" and began its operation.
The company changed "Omuro Studio" to "Takarazuka Kinema Studio" and put it into operation.
sen.cmt: changed "began its operation" to "put it into operation"
sen.e: The company changed 'Omuro Studio' to 'Takarazuka Kinema Studio' and put it into operation.
sen.cmt: " "を' 'に変更しました。

sen.j: 東亜キネマ、同社の製作を代行した東活映画社、そして正映マキノキネマの残党の受け皿となった。
sen.e: The company employed the former employees of Toa Kinema, its production company Tokatsu Eiga-sha and Shoei Makino Kinema.
They employed former employees of Toa Kinema, its production company Tokatsu Eiga-sha and Shoei Makino Kinema.
sen.cmt: changed "The company" to "They"; eliminated "the" after "employed";
sen.e: They employed former employees of Toa Kinema, its production company Tokatsu Eiga-sha and Shoei Makino Kinema.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 設立第1作は東亜・東活系の堀江大生監督の『敵討愛慾行』で、同年12月15日に公開された。
sen.e: The first film "Katakiuchi Aiyokuko", which was directed by Daisho HORIE of Toa/Tokatsu line, was released on December 15 of the year.
The first film the studio produced was "Katakiuchi Aiyokuko", directed by Daisho HORIE of Toa/Tokatsu line, and it was released on December 15 of the same year.
sen.cmt: added "the studio produced"; eliminated "which was" before "directed"; added "same"
sen.e: The first film the studio produced was "Katakiuchi Aiyokuko", directed by Daisho HORIE of Toa/Tokatsu line, and it was released on December 15 of the same year.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 同年内に5本を公開した。
sen.e: It released five films in the same year.
The studio released five films in its first year.
sen.cmt: changed "same year" to "first year"; changed "It" to "The studio"
sen.e: The studio released five films in its first year.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1933年（昭和8年）7月、賃金未払いが起きて、経営者と従業員が対立する。
sen.e: In July 1933, its management and employees came into confrontation due to the problem of unpaid wages.
In July of 1933, there was a confrontation between management and employees due to unpaid wages.
sen.cmt: rearranged sentence to read more naturally
sen.e: In July of 1933, there was a confrontation between management and employees due to unpaid wages.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 7月および8月の生産本数が如実に減り、映画館への作品の供給が滞る。
sen.e: As the number of films produced in July and August decreased substantially, its supply of films to movie theaters stagnated.
As the number of films the studio produced in July and August decreased substantially, its supply of films to movie theaters stagnated.
sen.cmt: added "the studio" after "number of films"
sen.e: As the number of films the studio produced in July and August decreased substantially, its supply of films to movie theaters stagnated.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1934年（昭和9年）1月14日、久保為義 監督の『霧の地下道』を「大阪パークキネマ」で、後藤岱山監督の『大利根の朝霧』と、そしてついに監督となった高村の初監督作『片仮名仁義』の二本立てを「大阪敷島倶楽部」で公開した。
sen.e: On January 14, 1934, the company put "Kiri no Chikado" directed by Tameyoshi KUBO on the screen at "Osaka Park Kinema" and put "Otone no Asagiri" directed by Taizan GOTO and "Katakana Jingi", the first film directed by Takayama after becoming a director, on the screen at "Osaka Shikishima Club".
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: On January 14, 1934, the studio released the film directed by Tameyoshi KUBO called "Kiri no Chikado" at "Osaka Park Kinema", as well as the film directed by Taizan GOTO called "Otone no Asagiri" and the first film directed by Takayama called "Katakana Jingi" at "Osaka Shikishima Club".
sen.cmt: changed "company" to "studio"; changed "put" to "released"; fixed to have less commas and read more naturally
sen.e: On January 14, 1934, the studio released the film directed by Tameyoshi KUBO called "Kiri no Chikado" at 'Osaka Park Kinema', as well as the film directed by Taizan GOTO called "Otone no Asagiri" and the first film directed by Takayama called "Katakana Jingi" at 'Osaka Shikishima Club.'
sen.cmt: 原文「」の部分を' 'に変更し、ピリオドを' 'の内側に移動させました。

sen.j: これが同社の最終作品となった。
sen.e: These were the last films produced by the company.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: These were the last films produced by the studio.
sen.cmt: changed "company" to "studio"
sen.e: These were the last films produced by the studio.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: The company was liquidated in February of the same year.
The company was liquidated in February of the same year.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: The company was liquidated in February of the same year.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 「御室撮影所」は同年9月から、田中伊助が設立したエトナ映画社が稼動、「エトナ映画京都撮影所」と改称した。
sen.e: The operation of "Omuro Study" was resumed in September of the year by Etona Eiga-sha established by Isuke TANAKA, and the studio was renamed "Etona Eiga Kyoto Studio".
"Omuro Studio" was put back into operation in September by Etona Eiga-sha, established by Isuke TANAKA, and the studio was renamed "Etona Eiga Kyoto Studio".
sen.cmt: Study→Studio; rearranged sentence and fixed grammar to read more naturally
sen.e: Omuro Studio' was put back into operation in September by Etona Eiga-sha, established by Isuke TANAKA, and the studio was renamed 'Etona Eiga Kyoto Studio.'
sen.cmt: 原文「」の部分を' 'に変更し、ピリオドを' 'の内側に移動させました。
